Package org.openpnp.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.model.AbstractModelObject
      • org.openpnp.model.PlacementsHolder<Board>
        • org.openpnp.model.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, Definable<Board>
    public class Board
extends PlacementsHolder<Board>
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    A Board describes the physical properties of a PCB and has a list of Placements that will be used to specify pick and place operations.
